channel.title: Turning on item IDs
channel.description: When im in aryan and i want the item's or whatever's ID i cant get it. I've tried right clicking but it doesnt show up :confused: . sorry if im being retarded... :( [br][size=1]Posted at: May 14, 2006, 10:27:49 am[/size][hr]nvm i got it. its f6 then click on the thing.... i think worked for me
